DataElement.preferredName: Evaluation Activity Relationship Probability Percent Unit ISO21090.REAL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A number representing the likelihood of the identified cause of an adverse event. EXAMPLE(S): 60% likelihood that an adverse event was caused by an activity that was performed on the subject.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Evaluation Activity Relationship Probability Percent Unit
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something._A measure of the expectation of the occurrence of a particular event.:A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Concepts.definition: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Property.preferredDefinition: A measure of the expectation of the occurrence of a particular event.:A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).

Concepts.definition: A measure of the expectation of the occurrence of a particular event.
A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
